Title: Establishes a non-trail snowmobile registration for snowmobiles which shall be used solely for the purpose of gaining access to hunting and fishing areas
Summary: Establishes a non-trail snowmobile registration for snowmobiles which shall be used solely for the purpose of gaining access to hunting and fishing areas; requires a $25 registration fee, $15 of which shall be deposited in a snowmobile trail development and maintenance fund.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the registration of snowmobiles used solely for the purpose of hunting or fishing
